Ensnaring Strike

Level 1 Conjuration Spell

Your attack summons thorny vines that possibly Ensnare your target.

Melee STR Save Concentration

Ensnaring Strike is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Ensnaring Strike is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflic
